Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these latest news articles people are talking about the upcoming Australian Federal Budget set to be unveiled on May 11th. The budget has allocated more than $11 billion over four years to support a 15% pay raise for over 250000 aged care workers which is expected to boost worker morale and address workforce issues. The budget will also provide extra funding for other initiatives such as changing the migration program to reduce the number of low-paid immigrants entering the country and the shift from 30-day to 60-day prescriptions.
